name: fight of trigger (beta)
description:
-Fight of trigger is a pvp fighting game (beta)

-Creator: me

-Ps4 Controller support

-🎮CONTROLS🎮

Space/ X button:  Jump,Select 

left mouse button/Square button :  Attack

X/Triangle  button: Counter-attack

W/Circle button: Hard attack,Deselect

Right mouse button/R2 button: Auto aim

2/R1 button : Switch weapon 2

A/L2 button : Block

1/L1 button :Switch weapon 1

E/Dpad up: Dash toward 

R/Dpad down: Dash back

T/Dpad left : Dash left 

Y/Dpad right : Dash right

V/R3 button : Trigger Vision

n/options button : Pause

,/touchpad : Statistical match

-My first game 

-Version: 0.1
